name: Cirrhus9
tag_list: cloud-computing, system-integrator, aws, 3tera, applogic, morphlabs, cloud
overview:
Cirrhus9 enables small and medium sized business become competitive and responsive to market demands by leveraging the power of cloud computing technologies. From the Small Business Startup package thru solutions to cloud enable ISPs and private data centers, Cirrhus9’s team are expert at building cloud based compute solutions. Migration to the Cloud must be designed, built and integrated, from the ground up so that it can support the processes and workflows that make your organization more efficient and flexible.

Cirrhus9’s common cloud framework, combines a detailed analysis of your companies’ key business processes, culture and technology capabilities to design a cloud solution capable of growing and scaling with your company.

C9 Cloud Integration Services cover migration the gamut from large business applications to small operational databases and ongoing support for legacy systems:
